title: keeptalkin
author: keeptalkin
content: Hi there, where can I buy Terra LUNA? The main exchanges seem not to be allowing this. I am new to all this (and based in the UK) and would like to know what if any options I have of buying Terra LUNA?

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: You can see all over sites that it is not advisable to buy Luna, if you lose, you lose. Check the sites you can buy it on Coingeckohttps://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terra-luna#markets

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on May 18, 2022, 03:07:03 PM...Check the sites you can buy it on Coingeckohttps://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/terra-luna#marketsI like to use Coinmarketcap more, respectively, I give a link to this service with an indication of the exchanges where Luna is traded: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/terra-luna/markets/ If the OP wants to buy Luna for a hold, he must take into account the fact that not all exchanges open withdrawal of this coin.

comments.author: whiteblue
comments.body: You can rely on the listed exchanges to trade luna coins on coinmarketcap and coinecko, you can choose one of them for safer access based on your country but if you buy it on a contract address the BSC network will not be supported to deposit to Binance.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: You can try Binance. There is a pair of LUNA/BUSD where you gonna need BUSD to be able to buy LUNA.Be careful what you are buying, make sure you are aware of what happened earlier on LUNA, and a piece of advice, not all cheap altcoins are worth buying. Just my 2 cents.

comments.author: manok jepang
comments.body: Hi buddy,,,!!! are you sure you want to buy terra luna, and do you know what's going on with the token now, I think you should research more deeply about this token so you don't regret it later, but if your determination is made up and want to buy you can buy it at coinmarcetcap and coinecko.

comments.author: keeptalkin
comments.body: I can't say thank you enough for everyones help and advice. I'm a contrarian by nature so i'm aware its a mega bad time for the coin right now; however sometimes the line between being a 'contrarian' and a fool can be a very thin one so i'm trying not to fall foul of that as well. Out of curiosity can anyone see any chance of this recovering to $1+ at all (such as through the proposed changes that were outlined)? Thanks again everyone for your input!

comments.author: Little_Sister
comments.body: Quote from: GreatArkansas on May 18, 2022, 03:31:16 PMYou can try Binance. There is a pair of LUNA/BUSD where you gonna need BUSD to be able to buy LUNA.Be careful what you are buying, make sure you are aware of what happened earlier on LUNA, and a piece of advice, not all cheap altcoins are worth buying. Just my 2 cents.The advice for trading on binance is great even though there are other top exchanges already listed for luna trading. But the choice of investing in Luna is very risky as the team seems to focus only on its wishes and ignores the actual voting of the community to burn the coins.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 04:05:24 PMI can't say thank you enough for everyones help and advice. I'm a contrarian by nature so i'm aware its a mega bad time for the coin right now; however sometimes the line between being a 'contrarian' and a fool can be a very thin one so i'm trying not to fall foul of that as well. Out of curiosity can anyone see any chance of this recovering to $1+ at all (such as through the proposed changes that were outlined)? Thanks again everyone for your input!A recovery is very unlikely, I know what you are thinking, if you were to invest in luna right now at a price of 0.00017 and it reached one dollar again that will be a growth close to 6000x, so even an investment as low as 100 dollars will give you massive profits, now if you are willing to take the risk and such an amount of money is nothing for you then you could take the risk, however I will strongly warn you about investing any significant amount of money in a project that is dying.

comments.author: Faisal2202
comments.body: Not a good question, you can search on cmc or on coin gecko to see the markets currently allowing Luna to trade, along with trading volume, but as you said you are new to crypto, so you have to get some knowledge of crypto like by watching videos or reading articles, this will enhance the content quality of this forum such lame questions are seems to be spamming to me,

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: Quote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 04:05:24 PMOut of curiosity can anyone see any chance of this recovering to $1+ at all (such as through the proposed changes that were outlined)? Thanks again everyone for your input!No chance for the current token as it has trillions of supply but im not sure about the new token that will come soon. You must aware if the current token will be replaced with the new tokens that will be distributed at the end of this month. is not it better for you waiting for the new token to be launched rather than gambling on the current token that will be replaced by the new token soon? i have been reading the whole proposal about the fork of terra luna blockchain and it seems like too many manipulation on the vote. $1 was impossible rate even when you are waiting for the next decade

comments.author: Davian144
comments.body: Quote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 02:58:43 PMHi there, where can I buy Terra LUNA? The main exchanges seem not to be allowing this. I am new to all this (and based in the UK) and would like to know what if any options I have of buying Terra LUNA?Terra Luna can still be purchased on many exchanges now because several exchanges that have suspended Terra Luna have been re-listed so that anyone can buy it back at will because you can immediately see Terra Luna here: https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies /terra-luna/markets/Hope you are helped.

comments.author: Mame89
comments.body: Before buying, be sure to check first. because the founder of Luna has been summoned by the South Korean court because of the fault experienced by the founder's own fault. my advice is better buy luna later because it will migrate to lunc v2 or look for clearer information yourself to be sure. this is just an information i got. the right to buy is up to you this can be an option.?

comments.author: ItsCrafty
comments.body: Quote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 02:58:43 PMHi there, where can I buy Terra LUNA? The main exchanges seem not to be allowing this. I am new to all this (and based in the UK) and would like to know what if any options I have of buying Terra LUNA?Luna buyers are now in high risk and can lose their money but if you want than it's available in Binance in different pair. You can also Use Ftx and Kucoin if available in your country.For any coin you want to invest you can check trading exchange in Coinmarketcap and coingecko.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 02:58:43 PMHi there, where can I buy Terra LUNA? The main exchanges seem not to be allowing this. I am new to all this (and based in the UK) and would like to know what if any options I have of buying Terra LUNA?You can buy Terra (LUNA) on major exchanges such as Binance, KuCoin, Gate.io, Huobi or FTX. However, instead of buying Terra (LUNA), I would suggest that you buy other coins/tokens, such as the news that has been circulating everywhere that UST has lost its peg and this has a huge impact on Terra (LUNA). For now, if you buy Terra (LUNA), you are not investing, but gambling, because the price of Terra (LUNA) is very volatile at the moment.

comments.author: andyou1234
comments.body: there are many main places to buy LUNA including CMC, KuCoin, Huobi or FTX and , Gate.io, but you should think again about buying this coin, because luna is currently experiencing a very severe crisis, where the price of this coin is falling very deep so it has a very large risk if invested,

comments.author: zidanw
comments.body: As been said by the others, there are many sites where you can buy that specific coin you are asking about. But, I want to also ask you to thing about it long and hard, if you are willing to risk your chances towards it. I know that by now you are aware of its current state, and its recovery is out of the picture at this rate and given moment. It is better to be safe than sorry. Think about your plans carefully.

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: You can buy Terra Luna from different places if you wish. In particular, all the exchanges have Terra Luna Trading from where you can buy. Such as Binance,  Kucoin, FTX, XT.com,....Etc

comments.author: Rigon
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on May 18, 2022, 05:21:04 PMQuote from: keeptalkin on May 18, 2022, 02:58:43 PMHi there, where can I buy Terra LUNA? The main exchanges seem not to be allowing this. I am new to all this (and based in the UK) and would like to know what if any options I have of buying Terra LUNA?You can buy Terra (LUNA) on major exchanges such as Binance, KuCoin, Gate.io, Huobi or FTX. However, instead of buying Terra (LUNA), I would suggest that you buy other coins/tokens, such as the news that has been circulating everywhere that UST has lost its peg and this has a huge impact on Terra (LUNA). For now, if you buy Terra (LUNA), you are not investing, but gambling, because the price of Terra (LUNA) is very volatile at the moment.If you want to buy Terra Luna, you can buy it from different exchange sites. Many of these have been given the name of the exchange, you can buy Terra Luna from here.Most of the major exchanges have set up here and you can easily buy Terra Luna from here if you want.However, if you want to buy from Binance Exchange, you have to deposit a minimum of $10+.

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: Binance is where most people are buying Luna. But as you've said, if you can't do it on centralized exchanges, you still have an option to trade, buy and sell it on pancakeswap.It has a lot of pairs to choose from if you really do want to buy this coin.https://pancakeswap.finance/swapBut my advice to you, buy only what you can afford to lose. The future of this project is now swinging and unknown.
